coredata.dc:title: On the molecular field theory of the nematic mesophase
coredata.dc:creator: Humphries, R.L.
Luckhurst, G.R.
coredata.dc:description:
Abstract
The temperature dependence of the orientational order in the nematic mesophase of 4,4′-dimethoxyazoxybenzene at constant volume is shown to be in complete accord with an extension of the Maier—Saupe theory to allow for all contributions to the anisotropic intermolecular potential.
